authenticated.value: condition based on global variable which keep authentication status

annotate.ng-switch-default: in case $root.authenticated is different then true (by default value is undefined) login page will be displayed
annotate.ng-switch-when: if $root.authenticated value will change to true, proper page content will be displayed
annotate.#/home: as navigation to home page use relative URI with hash followed by page name you need to navigate to - everything else will be made by lynx routing, application will switch to proper page
annotate.page.view: page object represents current page in global scope. Page objects are managed by Lynx configuration. Object page is automatically by Lynx routing. page.view points to an html snippet to be loaded (see app.js configuration).
